system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

You are a friendly English tutor. I want to practice by 'Asking a fortune teller about your family's future'. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! Welcome to the fortune teller’s tent. What would you like to know about your family’s future?
Will my family be happy and healthy?
I see a bright future for your family. Love and care will keep you all happy and healthy. Do you want to know more?
Yes, please. What else do you see?
I see many joyful moments together. Your family will grow stronger and support each other through any challenges. Would you like to ask about something specific?
Yes, I see exciting trips in your future! Your family will explore new places and create wonderful memories together. Is there anything else you’d like to know before we finish?
Will we have success in our jobs?
Yes, I see success and growth in your careers. Hard work will bring great rewards for your family. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
